name: Branching Corpses: Colony Queen
description:
Branching Corpses is a community made game series where you can extend the story.

This is not the start. It is advised you start from here: START

We also have a  wiki: https://branching-corpses.fandom.com/wiki/Branching_Corpses_Wiki

Colony Queen is a follow up to A Strange World's Claus Win's ending. Play it here.

Links to the next games in the story, depending on the ending:

  • BAA: Tree [NO GAME FOR THIS ENDING YET, YOU COULD MAKE IT!]
  • BAB: Guard [NO GAME FOR THIS ENDING YET, YOU COULD MAKE IT!]

Follow the game here on itch for updates.

Follow https://twitter.com/BranchingCorpse to keep up to date on the series.

Please join us on discord and help contribute to the story! https://discord.gg/VhfEwzg

CREDITS

Colony Queen is a "corpse" (a game in the Branching Corpses multiverse) made by BoneDaddy64 (aka Jeffrey Fillingham). Follow me on twitter for future corpses and other games: https://twitter.com/pmo_fillingham

Original music (city, cave, dream) by Cowberry

Many assets were taken from the previous games (G'Nikae sprites and bar artwork for example), Strange World by DistractedMOSFET and Branching Corpses by adriendittrick

Operator Loop (bar music), made by Pant0don https://opengameart.org/content/operator

The font in the game is "Romulus" made by Pix3M https://www.deviantart.com/pix3m

Colony Queen was made with Unity, and the entire project can be downloaded on this page.
